description.plain:
Sander van Dijck (born 26 November 1990) commonly known by his stage name San Holo, is a Dutch DJ, musician, record producer and composer. He gained international recognition for his remix of Dr. Dre’s The Next Episode, which currently has over 150 million views on YouTube. He has released music on several record labels including Spinnin' Records, OWSLA, Barong Family, and Monstercat. He also founded bitbird, a label which has released several of his singles including “Still Looking” and “Light.” San Holo’s first EP, Cosmos, was released via Heroic on 18 September 2014 and was in the Top 100 Electronic category of iTunes.

On September 21st, 2018, Djick released his debut album album1, featuring collaborations with artists such as Duskus, Bipolar Sunshine and The Nicholas.

On September 21st, 2018, Djick released his debut album album1, featuring collaborations with artists such as Duskus, Bipolar Sunshine and The Nicholas.

songs.title: One Thing

description.plain:
Conceptually the message of the song is something that has stuck with me for awhile but took awhile to really get there. Earlier last year a few months after “Light” came out I remember waking up and realized this feeling of chasing after something was probably never going to end, unless I changed my mindset. I’m still trying to figure it out. this song is a reminder to take a step back and enjoy the moment from time to time, cause thats really all there is. even though i might be really bad at it myself haha.

https://twitter.com/sanholobeats/status/930846304242229248

songs.embed_content: Read “One Thing” by San Holo on Genius
